title: UFO Corki with noise that gets annoying
body: In games, UFO corki keeps making loud weird noise (kinda goes like shungshungshung) continuously for the user and ally that sees corki in their screen. It gets so annoying and hard to hear other sounds effects making the gameplay worse.  It happens everygame with UFO corki throughout the whole game

replies.body:
Hey there! 

Thanks for the report! Have you noticed this happening only while doing certain things, or is it something that's ongoing, regardless of what's happening?
it happens from the moment the game starts and never ends regardless of anything.

Happened to me in an aram.  Muting the Corki didn't help. Can't say for sure if it kept it up all game, as I may have just started tuning it out, but it got irritating enough that I and my friend both tried to mute him.

Hey! I made a topic on this as well; it's definitely a problem. It's the passive sound that the skin has all game. If you can pull up the skin in a game you'll notice the volume discrepancy immediately. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/EaEim5hE-ufo-corkis-always-on-sound-effect-is-very-loud
I didn't know anybody owned that skin.
I've been having this issue whenever playing UFO Corki this patch as well. It's incredibly irritating and gives me a headache.
